short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search ChatGPT from your browser's address bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ask ChatGPT (URL Bar)
---------------------------------------
Seamlessly integrate ChatGPT into your Arc browser on Windows!
Key Features:

Quickly access ChatGPT by typing "gpt" followed by your query in the URL bar
Automatically redirects to The Official ChatGPT website and enters your query
Adds "Ask ChatGPT" functionality to Arc for Windows
100% safe: uses no external code or remote resources

How It Works:
This extension is built using only local JavaScript code. Here's how it functions:

It listens for navigation events in your browser.
When you type "gpt" followed by a query in the URL bar, the extension intercepts this input.
It then redirects you to ChatGPT and automatically fills in your query.
All processing happens locally within your browser, ensuring security and privacy.

How to Use:

Type "gpt" in your browser's URL bar, followed by a space
Enter your query (e.g., "gpt what is the capital of France?")
Press Enter, and you'll be taken directly to ChatGPT with your query pre-filled!

Perfect for Windows users of Arc who want quick and easy access to ChatGPT's AI capabilities.
Note: This is my first browser extension. It's designed to be simple, secure, and effective. While it requires a ChatGPT account to function, the extension itself doesn't handle any login information or personal data.
Enhance your Arc browsing experience on Windows with the safe and efficient "Ask ChatGPT (URL Bar)" extension!
